mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, REPAY_CAPITAL, REPAY_INTEREST, REPAY_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, OTHER_FEE, OTHER_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, CHARGE_AMOUNT, CHARGE_DATE, APPLY_STATUS, APPLY_COMMENT, CHARGE_RESULT, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, PROC_INST_ID
mapper.insert: insert into t_apply_public_repay (ID, APP_ID, REPAY_CAPITAL, REPAY_INTEREST, REPAY_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, OTHER_FEE, OTHER_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, CHARGE_AMOUNT, CHARGE_DATE, APPLY_STATUS, APPLY_COMMENT, CHARGE_RESULT, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, PROC_INST_ID ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{repayInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{repayOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{otherFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{otherOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chargeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_apply_public_repay
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPAY_CAPITAL = #{repayCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REPAY_INTEREST = #{repayInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REPAY_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{repayOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OTHER_FEE = #{otherFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OTHER_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{otherOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{chargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CHARGE_DATE = #{chargeDate,jdbcType=DATE},
APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_RESULT = #{chargeResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_apply_public_repay set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAY_CAPITAL = #{repayCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, REPAY_INTEREST = #{repayInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, REPAY_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{repayOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OTHER_FEE = #{otherFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OTHER_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{otherOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{chargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CHARGE_DATE = #{chargeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGE_RESULT = #{chargeResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.ID as id, a.APP_ID as appId, d.CONTRACT_NO as contractNo, b.NAME as custName, b.ID_NO as idNo, a.CHARGE_AMOUNT as chargeAmount, a.CHARGE_DATE as chargeDate, a.CREATE_DATE as applyDate, e.DICT_DATA_NAME as applyStatus, a.APPLY_COMMENT as applyComment, c.NAME_ as taskName, f.ACCOUNT_NAME as assignee, a.PROC_INST_ID as procInstId, g.PROC_DEF_ID_ as procDefId from T_APPLY_PUBLIC_REPAY a left join T_APPLY_TENANT b on a.APP_ID = b.APP_ID left join ACT_RU_TASK c on a.PROC_INST_ID = c.PROC_INST_ID_ left join T_SIGN_CONTRACT d on a.APP_ID = d.APP_ID left join SYS_DICT_DATA e on a.APPLY_STATUS = e.DICT_DATA_CODE left join SYS_ACCOUNT f on c.ASSIGNEE_ = f.ACCOUNT_ID left join ACT_HI_PROCINST g on a.PROC_INST_ID = g.PROC_INST_ID_ where a.CREATE_ID = #{createId}
